name: Grabber
description:
Grabber - you have a hand, you can throw it. Grab golden hands, avoid red hands and pay attention to how your hand moves.
WASD to move, arrow keys to rotate your hand, SPACE to launch your hand, F to toggle fullscreen.

Made for the One Hour Game Jam (http://onehourgamejam.com/) in a little over 2 hours (sorry).

HappyHead- art

pm2k - coding

SAKYUBASU 【サキュバス】- music
